# WDE Pull Request

## Summary
What does this change and why?

## Checklist
- [ ] Linted & formatted (`make lint`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Updated datasets.md / configs if data behavior changed
- [ ] No large binaries in Git (use DVC)

## Notes
Context, risks, or follow-ups.
